title: We are Innovators
description: Founded in August 2019, we are a technology start-up based in Kerala, India. We may be based in Kerala, but we work across countries without any differences. We are engineers, designers, tinkers, bikers, photographers, and many more.
quote: 'Apart from values and ethics which I have tried to live by, the legacy I would like to leave behind is a very simple one â€“ that I have always stood up for what I consider to be the right thing, and I have tried to be as fair and equitable as I could be.' - Ratan Tata

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We believe business without integrity is nothing but a scam.

values.title: Passion
values.description: We tirelessly pursue results, driven by a clear sense of purpose to make our clients and partners secure and successful.

values.title: Fun
values.description: We work hard and it is really fun. We believe if work isn't fun we are not doing it right.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We are curious by nature, hungry for knowledge, and excited about new challenges

values.title: Teamwork
values.description: Great things in business are never done by one person. They are done by a team of people.
